🏠 Open Springboard.Description: A reference/copyable shortcut, with only an "Open Springboard" action. This is not normally listed as an app you can open, but very useful in shortcuts.
🏠 Open Springboard.Name: 🏠 Open Springboard

🔍 iOS Signing Checker.Description: Check if a certain iOS version is signed.
🔍 iOS Signing Checker.Name: 🔍 iOS Signing Checker

👍 Emoji to Text Translator.Description: Translstes inputted emoji to a text explanation of it.
👍 Emoji to Text Translator.Name: 👍 Emoji to Text Translator

🌐 Open URL.Description: Opens a selected URL, or custom URL, in the hidden Safari browser on Apple Watch!
🌐 Open URL.Name: 🌐 Open URL

⏳ Discord Timestamp Generator.Description: Set the date and time, and convert it into Discord's Timestamp format. Just paste!
⏳ Discord Timestamp Generator.Name: ⏳ Discord Timestamp Generator

🤨 Random prnt.sc screenshot.Description: Puts together a random string of letters and numbers, and generates a link to prnt.sc
🤨 Random prnt.sc screenshot.Name: 🤨 Random prnt.sc screenshot

🎄Christmas Countdown.Description: Shows how many days there are until December 24th!
🎄Christmas Countdown.Name: 🎄 Christmas Countdown
